# init(usingTextLayoutManager:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new text view, with or without a text layout manager depending on the Boolean value you specify.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor convenience init(usingTextLayoutManager: Bool)
```

## Parameters

- **usingTextLayoutManager**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the framework should create the text view with an [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSTextLayoutManager].

## Initializing the text view

- **init(frame:textContainer:)**: Creates a new text view with the specified text container.
- **init(coder:)**: Creates a text view from data in an unarchiver.
